DOC.brief_summary: The main aim analyze whether routine use chest physiotherapy non cystic fibrosis bronchiectasis ( NCFB ) improve cough severity quality life population . In addition , secondary end-points include incidence exacerbation , change lung function , exercise capacity , airways inflammation , sputum analysis eventual adverse event .
DOC.brief_title: Long-term Airway Clearance Therapy Non-cystic Fibrosis Bronchiectasis
DOC.detailed_description: The present project single-blind , randomize , control trial 12-month daily perform chest physiotherapy compare usual care , follow 3-month intervention-free non-cystic fibrosis bronchiectasis . Intervention group perform daily autonomous airway clearance technique ( positive expiratory pressure technique Acapella device autogenic drainage technique ) . Patients receive professional session month . Control group receive usual care educational session disease . Physiotherapist call month . During study period patient ' pharmacological treatment remain unchanged
